articles.title: Kate Garraway: GMB host smiles during rare outing as husband Derek taken out of coma - Express
articles.description: KATE GARRAWAY - a host on Good Morning Britain - has been spotted putting on a brave face as her husband Derek Draper remains in hospital following his battle with coronavirus.
